pr_title: add wait-for-it.sh to start proxy after mysql instance available

timeline.message: add wait-for-it.sh to start proxy after mysql instance available

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think you can simply add a license header when you copy a file from others, especially it's not licensed with AL2.0 originally
https://github.com/vishnubob/wait-for-it/blob/master/wait-for-it.sh
timeline.author: kezhenxu94
